Reviews.Title: “A charming little gem in the heart of Paris”
Reviews.Author: PilarVM
Reviews.Content: fond memories western trocadero charming little hotel midst paris lot european hotel clean functional nice service friendly breakfast location excellent definitely

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, small room but superb service”

Reviews.Content: perfect hotel meeting friends nearby arrival gentleman desk welcoming expecting especially cot night paris fantastic view location clean requests met staff helpful towards toddler son offering food snacks helping entertain waited taxi friendly definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Small but pleasant hotel, superb location”
Reviews.Author: Noyawns
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights 2011 perfect polite helpful staff location night view eiffel tower steps outside lobby superb pjs midnight snap photos metro stop steps connecting roland garros 6 stops bathroom spacious love

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely return”

Reviews.Content: amazing location close champs elysees eiffel tower hotel lovely breakfast continental eat little basic hotel fantastic restaurants road amazing malakoff called particularly nice croque monsieur dinner chocolate crepe pudding french course food spot enjoyed ambiance visit disney train directly site okay day trip 15 didnt appeal paris fantastic shopping incredible food love sights didnt chance stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location!!!”
Reviews.Author: SerephanandMum
Reviews.Content: views eiffel tower perfect location 30 walk metro station located near busy corner lots cafes restaurants taxis short walk view eiffel tower 10min walk stand underneath nice staff reception breakfast available cafes doorstep didnt matter clean comfortable modern stay hopefully return paris

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: Mari_Castro
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel business trip stayed 42 wonderful view tower cozy space paris bed nice bathroom recently bathtube breakfast wellserved sort bread marmelade juices cheese etc price 11 euros person staff friendly specially stays weekends location hotel stays steps subway trocadero station neighborhood lot restaurantes coffee shops definetely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for business”
Reviews.Author: Chris-Redmond
Reviews.Content: travelled business stayed single night au trocadero decent sized paris bath opposed shower cubicle ive experienced elsewhere paris similar rate breakfast standard french fare cereals meats cheeses pastries tasty free wifi business
